detectors.description:
GoldPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#804-819) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(duration) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#809)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#812)

	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#L812)

detectors.description:

	State variables written after the call(s):

	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#775)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#684)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#775)

		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#683)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#775)
		- rewardRate = initreward.div(duration) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#792)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#775)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#781)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#686)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#775)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GoldPool.sol#687)
